prodNameC: 瑞達篩檢腺病毒檢測試劑組（未滅菌）
ingredientsDesc: Microwell plate, 12 microwell strips (which can be divided) in strip holder; coated with monoclonal antibodies (mouse) against adenovirusesSample dilution buffer: protein-buffered NaCl solution;contains 0.1% Kathon;Wash buffer: phosphate-buffered NaCl solution (10-fold concentrate); contains 0.1% ThimerosalPositive control: Inactivated adenoviruses; ready for use; contains 0.1% KathonPeroxidase-conjugated antibody in stabilized protein solution; contains 0.1% KathonSubstrate: Urea peroxide/TMB Stop reagent: 1 N sulphuric acid

efficacy: 檢測糞便檢體中腺病毒的存在量，或是用來確認體外培養的細胞中是否含有腺病毒。
